Description back to ToC

To capture the dynamic and interlinked nature of construction processes, activity (dice:Activity) is the central concept in the Digital Construction Entities ontology. Different aspects of construction process are associated with activity. Activities themselves can form complex hierarchies (work breakdown structures) where they are linked to each other through relations dice:hasSubActivity/dice:subActivityOf. In addition to that, activities are connected with different activity ingredients and aspects are shown in the figure below.

The different activity ingredients are connected to Activity through the relations shown in the figure below. The relations are specializations of the participant relation defined in BFO.
